query.formula: (A - sum(A) over ([-1..-1] partition by all order by ('SalesDate_Year~~~SalesDate_Month')))/(sum(A) over ([-1..-1] partition by all order by ('SalesDate_Year~~~SalesDate_Month')))
(B - sum(B) over ([-1..-1] partition by all order by ('SalesDate_Year~~~SalesDate_Month')))/(sum(B) over ([-1..-1] partition by all order by ('SalesDate_Year~~~SalesDate_Month')))
